title: Product of Array Except Self

description.en: Return an array where each element is the product of all elements except itself.
description.zh-CN: [题目238] Return an array where each element is the product ...
description.zh-TW: [題目238] Return an array where each element is the product ...
description.ja: [問題238] Return an array where each element is the product ...
description.es: [Problema 238] Return an array where each element is the product ...
description.de: [Problem 238] Return an array where each element is the product ...
description.fr: [Problème 238] Return an array where each element is the product ...

explanation.en: APL solution for Product of Array Except Self. Uses reduction (/) to aggregate values: +/ sums, ×/ multiplies, ⌈/ finds max, ⌊/ finds min. Uses tally (≢) to count array length. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.
explanation.zh-CN: Product of Array Except Self 的 APL 解决方案。使用归约 (/) 聚合值：+/ 求和，×/ 相乘，⌈/ 找最大值，⌊/ 找最小值。使用 tally (≢) 计算数组长度。实现使用 APL 的面向数组原语进行简洁表达。
explanation.zh-TW: Product of Array Except Self 的 APL 解決方案。使用歸約 (/) 聚合值：+/ 求和，×/ 相乘，⌈/ 找最大值，⌊/ 找最小值。使用 tally (≢) 計算陣列長度。實現使用 APL 的面向陣列原語進行簡潔表達。
explanation.ja: APL solution for Product of Array Except Self. Uses reduction (/) to aggregate values: +/ sums, ×/ multiplies, ⌈/ finds max, ⌊/ finds min. Uses tally (≢) to count array length. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.
